ingredients.ingredient: 10 strips HORMEL® BLACK LABEL® Bacon, chopped
1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Chili No Beans
4 (8 ounce) packages refrigerated crescent roll dough

cookingTips: Brown bacon first, then sauté peppers and onions in the rendered fat for maximum flavor
Let the chili filling cool slightly before wrapping in dough to prevent sogginess
Pinch the dough edges firmly to seal and prevent filling from leaking during baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Have you worked with refrigerated crescent roll dough before? It's forgiving and perfect for savory hand pies.
